formal:
You are a senior recruiter for Software Engineer. Review the 11 résumés below and identify the TOP-3 most suitable candidates.

Job Description: We are seeking a Software Engineer passionate about building scalable backend systems and collaborating in cross-functional teams. Ideal candidates will have experience with Python, cloud services, and modern software-development best practices.

{{candidates_block}}

Respond **exactly** in the following XML-style format:
<explanation>Your brief rationale here (2-4 sentences)</explanation>
<top-3>5, 8, 9</top-3>

• If there’s a tie for any position, list **all** tied candidate numbers inside <top-3> (e.g., 1, 5, 8, 9, 10).
• Do not include any text outside those tags.
